member.name: M:Solder.Core.DataType.SafeToString``1(``0)
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the specified type with the format specification. If the value is null, then the default value of a zero length string is returned.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to obtain a string representation.
member.param: The target value.
member.returns: A formatted string value if the value is not null; otherwise the default value specified.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.DataType.SafeToString``1(``0,System.String)
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the specified type with the format specification. If the value is null, then the default value of a zero length string is returned. No trimming is performed.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to obtain a string representation.
member.param: The target value.
The string specifying the format to use or null to use the default format defined for the type of the IFormattable implementation.
member.returns: A formatted string value if the value is not null; otherwise the default value specified.

member.param: The target value.
The string specifying the format to use or null to use the default format defined for the type of the IFormattable implementation.
The default value to return if the value is null.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.DataType.SafeToString``1(``0,System.String,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Returns a string that represents the specified type with the format specification. If the value is null, then the default value is returned. No trimming is performed.
member.typeparam: The type of the value to obtain a string representation.
member.param: The target value.
The string specifying the format to use or null to use the default format defined for the type of the IFormattable implementation.
The default value to return if the value is null.
Use default value if the formatted value is null or whotespace.
member.returns: A formatted string value if the value is not null; otherwise the default value specified.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.DataType.TryParse(System.Type,System.String,System.Object@)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation to its valueType equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
member.param: The type to convert the string value.
A string containing a valueType to convert.

When this method returns, contains the valueType value equivalent contained in value, if the conversion succeeded, or null if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the value parameter is null, is an empty string, or does not contain a valid string representation of an valueType. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: A boolean value of true if the value was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.DataType.TryParse``1(System.String,``0@)
member.summary: Converts the specified string representation to its TValue equivalent and returns a value that indicates whether the conversion succeeded.
member.typeparam: The type to parse the string value.
member.param: A string containing a TValue to convert.

When this method returns, contains the TValue value equivalent contained in value, if the conversion succeeded, or default(TValue) if the conversion failed. The conversion fails if the value parameter is null, is an empty string, or does not contain a valid string representation of a TValue. This parameter is passed uninitialized.
member.returns: A boolean value of true if the value was converted successfully; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.DependencyManagement.IDependencyManager.HasTypeResolution``1(System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are any registered dependency resolutions of the specified target type in this instance. If selector key is a null value, then this method will return true if any resolution exists for the specified target type, regardless of selector key; otherwise, this method will return true only if a resolution exists for the specified target type and selector key. This is the generic overload.
member.param: An null or zero or greater length string selector key.
member.typeparam: The target type of the check.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution is present.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.DependencyManagement.IDependencyManager.HasTypeResolution(System.Type,System.String)
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether there are any registered dependency resolutions of the specified target type in this instance. This is the non-generic overload.
member.param: The target type of the check.
An null or zero or greater length string selector key.
member.returns: A value indicating if at least one dependency resolution is present.

member.param: The target object.
member.returns: The custom attributes array or null.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.Reflexion.GetErrors(System.Exception,System.Int32)
member.summary: Returns the concatenation of error messages from an exception object. All inner exceptions and collected exceptions (public properties implementing IEnumerable<Exception>) are returned.
member.param: The root exception to get errors.
The indent level count.
member.returns: A string concatenation of error messages delimited by newlines.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.Reflexion.GetLogicalPropertyType(System.Object,System.String,System.Type@)
member.summary: Attempts to get the property type for a logical property (CLR, associative, etc.).
member.param: The target instance to search for a logical property.
The logical property name to get the type for.
An output run-time type of the logical property or null if the logical property lookup failed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the logical property name lookup was successful or not.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.Reflexion.GetLogicalPropertyValue(System.Object,System.String,System.Object@)

The logical property name to get the value for.
An output run-time value of the logical property or null if the logical property lookup failed.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the logical property name lookup was successful or not.

member.summary: A private extension method used to obtain the least-derived public, instance property of a given name.
member.param: The property type to interogate.
The property name to lookup.
member.returns: A PropertyInfo for the least-derived public, instance property by the given name or null if none were found.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.Reflexion.GetOneAttribute``1(System.Reflection.ICustomAttributeProvider)

member.param: The target ICustomAttributeProvider (Assembly, Type, MemberInfo, etc.)
member.returns: The single custom attribute or null if none are defined.

member.typeparam: The custom attribute type.
member.param: The target ICustomAttributeProvider (Assembly, Type, MemberInfo, etc.)

member.name: M:Solder.Core.Reflexion.SetLogicalPropertyValue(System.Object,System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Attempts to set the property value for a logical property (CLR, associative, etc.). This overload assume stayHard=false and makeSoft=true semantics.
member.param: The target instance to search for a logical property.
The logical property name to set the value for.
The value of the logical property to set or null.
member.returns: A value indicating whether the logical property name lookup was successful or not.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.Reflexion.SetLogicalPropertyValue(System.Object,System.String,System.Object,System.Boolean,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Attempts to set the property value for a logical property (CLR, associative, etc.).
member.param: The target instance to search for a logical property.
The logical property name to set the value for.
The value of the logical property to set or null.
Force only 'hard' object semantics and not use associative lookup (i.e. the target instance must be a real CLR object).
Allow making 'soft' object semantics (i.e. the target instance could be an associative object).
member.returns: A value indicating whether the logical property name lookup was successful or not; lookup respects the 'stayHard' and 'makeSoft' flags.

The proxy object instance.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.
member.returns: The return value from the invoked member, if appliable.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.AspectDynamicInvoker.OnInterceptAfterInvoke(System.Boolean,System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[],System.Object@,System.Exception@)
member.summary: This method is executed after the invoking the intercepted member on the intercepted instance. NOTE: The intercepted member can be accessed via the InterceptedInstance property. Do not confuse the intercepted member for the target instance. The target instance is the underlying proxy object.
member.param: A value indicating whether the invocation of the member preceeded this interception point.
The runtime type of the invoking instance (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo that was to be invoked.
The target object instance of the invocation.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.
The return value from the invoked member, if appliable.

The exception thrown from the invoked member or null if no error (as input); an exception to rethrow or null (as output). The implementation can choose to swallow a thrown exception or project an exception where none was thrown at the taret invocation.
member.returns: A value indicating whether to proceed with the invoking the member.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.AspectDynamicInvoker.OnInterceptBeforeInvoke(System.Boolean@,System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method is executed before the invoking the intercepted member on the intercepted instance. NOTE: The intercepted member can be accessed via the InterceptedInstance property. Do not confuse the intercepted member for the target instance. The target instance is the underlying proxy object.
member.param: A value indicating whether to proceed with the invoking the member.
The runtime type of the invoking instance (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo to invoke.
The target object instance of the invocation.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.AspectDynamicInvoker.OnInterceptProceedInvoke(System.Type,System.Reflection.MethodInfo,System.Object,System.Object[])
member.summary: This method is executes the the intercepted member on the intercepted instance. NOTE: The intercepted member can be accessed via the InterceptedInstance property. Do not confuse the intercepted member for the target instance. The target instance is the underlying proxy object. Generally, inheritors will use the default implementation of this method but advanced scenarios can override this method ensuring a base call.
member.param: The run-time type of the proxied type (may differ from MethodInfo.DeclaringType).
The MethodInfo of the invoked member.
The proxy object instance.
The parameters passed to the invoked member, if appliable.
member.returns: The return value from the invoked member, if appliable.

member.name: P:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.AspectDynamicInvoker.InterceptedInstance
member.summary: Gets the intercepted instance.

member.name: T:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1
member.summary: Acts as an abstract factory for proxy objects, with cache support. Uses reader-writer lock for asynchronous protection (i.e. thread-safety). Provides agregated disposal of all cached proxies in the cache by calling Dispose() (if IDisposable).
member.typeparam: The type of the cache trait.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1.#ctor
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the ProxyFactory`1 class.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1.DisposeOf(System.Object)
member.summary: Disposes of the inner proxies, if present. Once disposed, the instance cannot be reused.
member.param: The proxy to dispose of.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1.CreateOrGetInstance``1(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Type,`0},System.Func{``0})
member.summary: Returns an instance of the specified proxy type for the given key-value pair for a type and cache trait. If the instance is in the cache, it will be returned; otherwise a new instacne is created, added to the cache, and returned. This method is thread-safe: a reader-writer-lock is used to serialize access in the case of a new addition to the cahce.
member.typeparam: The type of proxy object to return.
member.param: The cahce trait used to check cache existence.

A callback is specified to provide a factory method mechanism. This allows inheritors the abillity to customize the object being created. This method is only called if a new object is required; i.e. the object does not exist in the cache with the specified type and cahce trait.
member.returns: An instance of the specified proxy type.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1.Dispose
member.summary: Notifies any registered listeners to the DisposeInstances event to dispose then clears the internal cache. Once disposed, the instance cannot be reused.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1.IsInstanceInCache(System.Collections.Generic.KeyValuePair{System.Type,`0})
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether an object of a type exists in the cache with the specified cache trait.
member.param: A key-value pair object representing the cache trait for a given type.
member.returns: True if an object exists in the cache with the given cache trait for the typr; otherwise false.

member.name: P:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.ProxyFactory`1.Disposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current instance has been disposed.

member.name: T:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1
member.summary: Provides an abstract base for real proxy objects which leverage the dynamic invoker infrastructure (i.e. IDynamicInvocation).
member.typeparam: The type of the transparent proxy object served up by this class.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.#ctor(Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.IDynamicInvocation)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1 class.
member.param: The dynamic invoker object to use.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.CanCastTo(System.Type,System.Object)
member.summary: Checks whether the proxy that represents the specified object type can be cast to the type represented by the IRemotingTypeInfo interface.
member.returns: true if cast will succeed; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type to cast to.
The object for which to check casting.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.Dispose
member.summary: Disposes of the inner dynamic invoker. Once disposed, the instance cannot be reused.

member.name: M:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.Invoke(System.Runtime.Remoting.Messaging.IMessage)
member.summary: Runtime real proxy invocation.
member.param: Invocation call message
member.returns: Invocation return message.

member.name: P:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.Disposed
member.summary: Gets a value indicating whether the current instance has been disposed.

member.name: P:Solder.Core.RuntimeInterception.RemotingImpl.DynamicInvokerRealProxy`1.TypeName
member.summary: Gets or sets the fully qualified type name of the server object in a ObjRef. No implementation is provided; any calls will throw a NotSupportedException.
member.returns: The fully qualified type name of the server object in a ObjRef.
